wines.productName: Dominique Portet Cabernet Sauvignon Yarra Valley 2017
wines.description: From the 2017 vintage, expect cedar and firm tannins. Represents excellent value for this quality level.

tastingNotes.aroma: The nose opens with alluring aromas of tobacco and vanilla, followed by refined notes of dark chocolate. With time in the glass, additional layers emerge, adding depth and intrigue to the aromatic profile.
tastingNotes.palate: On the palate, firm tannins takes center stage, complemented by blackberry and plum. The luxurious texture and structured structure create a compelling drinking experience that showcases both fruit purity and winemaking skill.
tastingNotes.finish: The impressive finish is memorable and structured, leaving a lasting impression. This wine demonstrates excellent character and will provide enjoyment for years to come.

wineDetails.ageability: Drink now through 2030, with potential for further development

wines.productName: Tapwines Serena Piu Fizz "Prosecco" Style Keg Sample Bottle
wines.description: This artisanal selection delivers citrus and crisp. Shows the hallmark characteristics of its terroir.

tastingNotes.aroma: The nose opens with delicate aromas of floral and dark fruits, followed by pure notes of spice. With time in the glass, additional layers emerge, adding depth and intrigue to the aromatic profile.
tastingNotes.palate: On the palate, balanced takes center stage, complemented by structured and fruit-forward. The silky texture and well-balanced structure create a compelling drinking experience that showcases both fruit purity and winemaking skill.
tastingNotes.finish: The persistent finish is graceful and persistent, leaving a lasting impression. This wine demonstrates excellent character and will provide enjoyment for years to come.

wineDetails.ageability: Drink now through 2030, with potential for further development

wines.productName: Black Elephant Vintners Two Dogs, A Peacock, & A Horse Sauvignon Blanc 2025
wines.description: An exceptional 2025 wine featuring passion fruit and citrus. An outstanding example of its style and region.

tastingNotes.aroma: The nose opens with pronounced aromas of grass and gooseberry, followed by complex notes of passion fruit. With time in the glass, additional layers emerge, adding depth and intrigue to the aromatic profile.
tastingNotes.palate: On the palate, mineral takes center stage, complemented by crisp acidity and citrus. The velvety texture and harmonious structure create a compelling drinking experience that showcases both fruit purity and winemaking skill.
tastingNotes.finish: The lingering finish is elegant and zesty, leaving a lasting impression. This wine demonstrates excellent character and will provide enjoyment for years to come.

wineDetails.ageability: Drink now through 2030, with potential for further development

wines.description: Representing the 2014 harvest, this offers vanilla and velvety. Crafted with meticulous attention to detail.

tastingNotes.aroma: The nose opens with intense aromas of earth and floral, followed by layered notes of dark fruits. With time in the glass, additional layers emerge, adding depth and intrigue to the aromatic profile.
tastingNotes.palate: On the palate, fruit-forward takes center stage, complemented by complex and balanced. The smooth texture and integrated structure create a compelling drinking experience that showcases both fruit purity and winemaking skill.
tastingNotes.finish: The long finish is refined and elegant, leaving a lasting impression. This wine demonstrates excellent character and will provide enjoyment for years to come.

wineDetails.ageability: Drink now through 2030, with potential for further development

wines.description: A remarkable 2017 bottling displaying apple and mineral. A versatile wine that pairs beautifully with food.

tastingNotes.aroma: The nose opens with subtle aromas of apple and citrus, followed by nuanced notes of butter. With time in the glass, additional layers emerge, adding depth and intrigue to the aromatic profile.
tastingNotes.palate: On the palate, peach takes center stage, complemented by toasted oak and mineral. The polished texture and cohesive structure create a compelling drinking experience that showcases both fruit purity and winemaking skill.
tastingNotes.finish: The extended finish is polished and refreshing, leaving a lasting impression. This wine demonstrates excellent character and will provide enjoyment for years to come.

wineDetails.ageability: Drink now through 2030, with potential for further development

wines.productName: Rivers Edge Barrell Select Pinot Noir 2020
wines.description: This 2020 expression showcases raspberry and silky. Perfect for current enjoyment or short-term cellaring.

tastingNotes.aroma: The nose opens with vibrant aromas of earth and mushroom, followed by expressive notes of rose petals. With time in the glass, additional layers emerge, adding depth and intrigue to the aromatic profile.
tastingNotes.palate: On the palate, silky takes center stage, complemented by red fruits and spice. The refined texture and elegant structure create a compelling drinking experience that showcases both fruit purity and winemaking skill.
tastingNotes.finish: The enduring finish is sophisticated and smooth, leaving a lasting impression. This wine demonstrates excellent character and will provide enjoyment for years to come.

wineDetails.ageability: Drink now through 2030, with potential for further development

wines.description: Crafted in 2021, this wine reveals butter and peach. A wine that balances tradition with modern winemaking.

tastingNotes.aroma: The nose opens with expressive aromas of tropical fruits and apple, followed by elegant notes of citrus. With time in the glass, additional layers emerge, adding depth and intrigue to the aromatic profile.
tastingNotes.palate: On the palate, mineral takes center stage, complemented by creamy and peach. The supple texture and refined structure create a compelling drinking experience that showcases both fruit purity and winemaking skill.
tastingNotes.finish: The sustained finish is distinguished and clean, leaving a lasting impression. This wine demonstrates excellent character and will provide enjoyment for years to come.

wineDetails.ageability: Drink now through 2030, with potential for further development
